data.name: Bad Bad
data.detailed_description:
What kind of work is this?


In the game, you will play as an indestructible gunner with extremely high HP and grenades. The goal is to find a way out and get near the helicopter. The game has 5 weapons and 2 supplies to pick up or drop, including batons, pistols, shotguns, submachine guns, howitzers, medical kits and ammo packs, pick up these guys and bravely greet the enemies and roadblocks that stand in your way Bar!

How to play games and save money?


The game will drop in price during the discount period, if you want to save your money, please buy it after seeing the 40% off tag.

What should I do if I don't like the game?


You can leave a negative review in the Steam comment area, and submit a refund request to the Steam customer service in a timely manner, and the Steam customer service will agree to every reasonable refund request.

3000 studio works, thank you for playing.


Player QQ group: 583461040

data.short_description: You play as a shooter along the way shooting bombs, destroying barricades, finding supplies and roads until you see a helicopter to complete the game. After the battle, don't forget to admire the anime foot wall on the road.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: i3-530 2.93GHZ 2 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Shader Model 5.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: i7-7700k 4.2GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Shader Model 5.0

content_descriptors.notes: The game building textures are close-ups of anime female feet, including silk feet, bare feet, feet painted with cream, and bound feet. The adult content in the game is limited to this, and does not include underage pornography, sexual assault, non-consensual sexual behavior, drug use, alcoholism, self-harm, politics, violence, blood and other content.
